comment:
* Contains the User Capability Exchange capabilities corresponding to a contact's URI.
 * @hide

variables.name: CAPABILITY_CHAT_SESSION_STORE_FORWARD
variables.comment: Supports full store and forward group chat information.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_FILE_TRANSFER
variables.comment: * Supports file transfer via Message Session Relay Protocol (MSRP) without Store and Forward.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_FILE_TRANSFER_STORE_FORWARD
variables.comment: Supports File Transfer with Store and Forward

variables.name: CAPABILITY_VIDEO_SHARE_DURING_CS_CALL
variables.comment: Supports video sharing during a circuit-switch call (IR.74)

variables.name: CAPABILITY_VIDEO_SHARE
variables.comment: Supports video share outside of voice call (IR.84)

variables.name: CAPABILITY_IP_VOICE_CALL
variables.comment: Supports IP Voice calling over LTE or IWLAN (IR.92/IR.51)

variables.name: CAPABILITY_GEOLOCATION_PUSH
variables.comment: Supports Geolocation PUSH during 1-to-1 or multiparty chat

variables.name: CAPABILITY_GEOLOCATION_PUSH_SMS
variables.comment: Supports Geolocation PUSH via SMS for fallback.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_GEOLOCATION_PULL_FILE_TRANSFER
variables.comment: Supports Geolocation pull using file transfer support.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_RCS_VIDEO_ONLY_CALL
variables.comment: Supports RCS video calling, where video media can not be dropped.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_CALL_COMPOSER
variables.comment: Supports call composer, where outgoing calls can be enriched with pre-call content.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_POST_CALL
variables.comment: Supports post call information that is included in the call if the call is missed.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_SHARED_MAP
variables.comment: Supports sharing a map where the user can draw, share markers, and share their position.

variables.name: CAPABILITY_SHARED_SKETCH
variables.comment: Supports sharing a canvas, where users can draw, add images, and change background colors.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)
public boolean isCapable(@CapabilityFlag long type)
methods.comment:
* Query for a capability
     * @param type The capability flag to query.
     * @return true if the capability flag specified is set, false otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean isCapable(@NonNull String extensionTag)
methods.comment: * @return true if the extension service tag is set, false otherwise.

methods.name: public List<String> getCapableExtensionTags()
methods.comment:
* @return An immutable list containing all of the extension tags that have been set as capable.
     * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if this list is modified.

methods.name: public Uri getServiceUri(@CapabilityFlag long type)
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the {@link Uri} associated with the capability being queried. *

* This will typically be the contact {@link Uri} available via {@link #getContactUri()} unless * a different service {@link Uri} was associated with this capability using * {@link Builder#add(long, Uri)}. * * @return a String containing the {@link Uri} associated with the service tag or * {@code null} if this capability is not set as capable. * @see #isCapable(long)

methods.name: public Uri getContactUri()
methods.comment: * @return the URI representing the contact associated with the capabilities.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)
